recipe.title: Crème Fraîche
instructions: 1. Whisk the heavy cream and the sour cream together in a small bowl. 2. Pour the mixture into a jar, cover and let stand in a warm place for 12 hours. Then stir and refrigerate for 24 hours. Serve.
